text: Paul Labile Pogba is a French professional footballer. He plays for MLS club DC United and the France national team. Pogba began his professional career with Manchester United in 2011. In 2012 he began playing for Juventus. In 2016 he transferred back to Manchester United for a world-record £89m. ==International career== National team Year Apps Goals France 2013 7 1 France 2014 15 4 France 2015 5 0 France 2016 17 3 France 2017 5 0 Total Total 49 8 He won the World Cup for France against Croatia on 15 July 2018. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Île-de-France Category:People from Seine-et-Marne Category:1993 births Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players
title: Paul Pogba
